Bibliographic References: Greco Pontrandolfo, Dial, di Arch. n.s. 1, 1979/2, p. 37, fig. 8 (where the contents of the tomb are published—bellNon Sepcifiedkrater 21206, skyphos 21208, stemless cup) and / Lucani, pi. 20 above (where the stemless cup is omitted).
Imagery Description: (a) Draped woman with cista and thyrsus. (b) Nude youth, with drapery over left arm, holding wreath.
